name: rss-bridge
description: RSS-Bridge is a self-hosted feed generator that fetches content from webpages and delivers custom RSS/Atom feeds. It supports dozens of sites and simplifies subscription management.
features: Feed generation: Create RSS feeds from websites that don't offer them natively.
Pre-built bridges: Use ready-made scrapers for popular sites like Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube.
Custom bridges: Write your own bridges to generate feeds from any website.
Multiple formats: Output feeds in RSS, Atom, JSON, or HTML formats.
Parameter support: Customize feed generation with URL parameters for filtering.
Caching: Store generated feeds temporarily to reduce server load and improve speed.
Web interface: Browse available bridges and generate feeds through a simple UI.
API access: Generate feeds programmatically for automation or integration.
Content filtering: Include or exclude items based on keywords or patterns.
Image proxying: Serve images through your server to avoid tracking pixels.
Rate limiting: Control request frequency to avoid overwhelming source websites.
Error handling: Gracefully handle site changes or temporary unavailability.
